item.title: Hackathon: LeRobot
item.author: Corentin
item.description: Introduction I participated in the LeRobot Hackathon in Toulouse, organized by the great Hugging Face team ðŸ¤— ! It was a great way to get my first steps into real-world reinforcement learning and robotics. We went from having a very messy table (see below) with a lot of hardware parts to a fully assembled robot in a few hours. It was a robotic arm with a gripper, the Moss v1 and we had to teach it to push a cube.
